TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供建置通道接聽程式和通道處理站所需之位址、繫結、繫結項目和繫結參數的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about the addresses, bindings, binding elements and binding parameters required to build the channel listeners and channel factories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 然後，通道接聽程式和通道處理站就會建構用來處理傳入和傳出訊息的通道堆疊。The channel listeners and channel factories, in turn, construct the channel stacks used to process incoming and outgoing messages. 繫結內容也會提供用來建構通道和接聽程式堆疊之內部通道處理站和通道接聽程式的連結。The binding context also provides the linkage to the inner channel factories and channel listeners that are used to construct the channel and listener stacks. 繫結內容基本上會在建構通道堆疊的期間，儲存所需的所有動態資訊。The binding context basically stores all of the dynamic information needed during the construction of the channel stack.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

value.span: 建置於目前內容中之通道的 。

span.span: The for the channel built in the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個集合會保存從繫結建立通道堆疊時所遇到的設定。This collection holds the settings encountered when building the channel stack from the bindings. 在建立期間必須在通道堆疊內往下推動的設定會被放入此集合中，直到堆疊內較低層的通道需要這些設定為止。Settings that need to be pushed down the channel stack during creation are put into the collection until a channel lower in the stack needs them. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext Clone() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回目前通道建置內容的複本。

span.span: Returns a copy of the current channel build context.

returns.span: 物件，它是目前通道建置內容的複本。

span.span: A object that is a copy of the current channel build context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回一個複本，此複本是繫結內容的深層複製品。This method returns a copy that is a deep clone of your binding context. 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. (這也稱為複製整個物件圖形)。相較之下，物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。(This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#13)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#13)]

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製繫結內容，並在繫結內容中所儲存的下一個繫結項目上呼叫 。Clones the binding context and calls on the next binding element stored in the binding context. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#14)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得服務接聽之端點位址的方式，是將 附加至 。The address for the endpoint at which a service listens is obtained by appending the to the . 可以使用 屬性來設定這個絕對位址。This absolute address can be set using the property. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RemainingBindingElements As BindingElementCollection

summary.span: 取得其他繫結項目用來建構通道堆疊的繫結項目。

span.span: Gets the binding elements that are used by other binding elements to construct the channel stack.

value.span: ，其中包含其他繫結項目用來建構通道堆疊的繫結項目。

span.span: The that contains the binding elements that are used by other binding elements to construct the channel stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 放入此集合中的繫結項目，指的是那些未直接對應到其中一個通道堆疊內之接聽程式或處理站的項目。The binding elements that are put into this collection are those elements that do not correspond directly to a listener or factory in one of the channel stacks. 例如，編碼器繫結項目最後會在此集合中，然後由傳輸通道用來建構訊息編碼器。The encoder binding element, for example, ends up in this collection and is then used by the transport channel to construct a message encoder. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#8)]
